details.title: Keeping current with technology: Identifying re-host candidates
details.abstract: How to identify when a static pattern digital test program should be re-hosted as a dynamic pattern set on the state-of-the-art ATE is complicated. However, there are critical issues that should be evaluated when making this decision. Issues include chip models, timing parameters, drive strength, logic levels, circuit complexity, I/O pins, automated diagnostics, portability, reuse, speed, optimal circuit coverage, schematics, and data availability.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
